articles.image_title: CRIMEA, RUSSIA - JANUARY 9, 2020: The Supreme Commander-in-Chief of the Russian Armed Forces, Russia's President Vladimir Putin (L) views a joint exercise by the Northern and the Black Sea Fleets in the Black Sea from aboard the Marshal Ustinov Russian missile cruiser. Pictured R-L are the Commander of the Russian Army's Southern Military District, Col Gen Alexander Dvornikov, the Commander-in-Chief of the Russian Navy, Admiral Nikolai Yevmenov, and Russia's Defense Minister Sergei Shoigu. Alexei Druzhinin/Russian Presidential Press and Information Office/TASS
